examples: She lived a very peaceful life.
She lives just a stone's throw away from the beach.
He lives far from the city center.
He lived in a small town with friendly neighbors.
She lived in the same village from the cradle to the grave.
words.defineEn: to have your home in a specific place or to share it with a particular person
words.defineVi: để có nhà của bạn ở một nơi cụ thể hoặc để chia sẻ nó với một người cụ thể

examples: That hot guy had a good head on his shoulders.
The hotel had expensive rates during the holiday season.
The group has a new CD in the pipeline.
The police had the situation well in hand.
The theatre company has several new productions in the pipeline for next season.
words.defineEn: to hold, possess, or own an object or a quality
words.defineVi: để giữ, sở hữu, hoặc sở hữu một đối tượng hoặc một chất lượng

examples: Watch your mouth!
The girls watched the development of this relationship with incredulity.
A large crowd watched the game on Saturday.
Watch your head on the low ceiling.
Watch me!
words.defineEn: to look at a thing or person and pay attention to it for some time
words.defineVi: để nhìn vào một điều hoặc người và chú ý đến nó trong một thời gian

examples: listen to our problems.
Listen Jane.
I listened carefully to her story.
Don’t listen to Jerry.
Don't listen to him.
words.defineEn: to give our attention to the sound a person or thing is making
words.defineVi: để cung cấp cho sự chú ý của chúng tôi đến âm thanh một người hoặc điều đang làm

examples: Generally, the article reads very well.
My son reads twelve pages of his book every day.
Read my lips.
Read my lips.
Teachers should read more poetry to children.
words.defineEn: to look at written or printed words and understand their meaning
words.defineVi: nhìn vào các từ được viết hoặc in và hiểu ý nghĩa của chúng

examples: The factory employee was eating lunc in the cafeteria.
so I ate my fill.
I eat pizza on Wednesdays.
I ate a delicious apple for a healthy snack.
I ate a handful of sweet grapes for a refreshing snack.
words.defineEn: to put food into the mouth, then chew and swallow it
words.defineVi: để đưa thức ăn vào miệng, sau đó nhai và nuốt nó

examples: The children drank their juice from colorful plastic glasses.
My parents always drink orange juice for breakfast.
Get a drink for John.
I usually drink a cup of green tea in the afternoon.
My brother always drinks smoothie after exercising.
words.defineEn: to put water, coffe, or other type of liquid inside of our body through our mouth
words.defineVi: để đưa nước, cà phê, hoặc loại chất lỏng khác bên trong cơ thể của chúng tôi thông qua miệng của chúng tôi

examples: His frame spoke tiredness.
He spoke the final words of the play.
The brochure speaks of beautiful secluded grounds.
My mother spoke Russian.
Please speak more slowly.
words.defineEn: to use one's voice to express a particular feeling or to communicate information
words.defineVi: sử dụng giọng nói của một người để thể hiện một cảm giác cụ thể hoặc để truyền đạt thông tin

examples: you want a knuckle sandwich?
We want a deal.
I want a new job.
To want children/kids.
I want a dish of creamy mushroom bucatini with Parmesan right now.
words.defineEn: to wish to do or have something
words.defineVi: muốn làm hoặc có một cái gì đó

examples: Over seven hundred Facebook users have already liked the company’s website.
He likes the comfortable seats and big screen at the movie theater.
By the next morning, over twenty of my friends had liked my new profile picture.
Like the commandments written in stone.
Such helps were like drop in the ocean.
words.defineEn: to feel that someone or something is good, enjoyable, or interesting
words.defineVi: để cảm thấy rằng một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó là tốt, thú vị, hoặc thú vị

examples: The students worked their heart and soul on their project.
Not working my foot.
Soymilk works well as a substitute for milk in sauces and creamy pasta dishes.
My dad works forty hours a week.
To work clay.
words.defineEn: to do certain physical or mental activities in order to achieve a result or as a part of our job
words.defineVi: để làm một số hoạt động thể chất hoặc tinh thần để đạt được một kết quả hoặc là một phần của công việc của chúng tôi

examples: My friend studied the nutritional benefits of different legumes for her research project.
We study the history of our country in social studies class.
She studied different subjects in school, from math to history.
We study different subjects like math, science, and English at school.
Researchers study diatoms to better understand the environmental conditions of aquatic habitats.
words.defineEn: to spend time to learn about certain subjects by reading books, going to school, etc.
words.defineVi: dành thời gian để tìm hiểu về các chủ đề nhất định bằng cách đọc sách, đi học, v.v.

examples: The Siemens display goes the whole hog.
The cruise went very quickly.
My laptop went haywire
To go swimming/fishing/jogging.
The email went to everyone in the company.
words.defineEn: to travel or move from one location to another location
words.defineVi: để đi du lịch hoặc di chuyển từ một địa điểm đến một địa điểm khác

examples: The soup needs a little more seasoning.
This shirt needs washing.
My father's car needs an oil change.
I need a lightweight sweater for the spring season.
We need a new brush for our pet's fur.
words.defineEn: to want something or someone that we must have if we want to do or be something
words.defineVi: muốn một cái gì đó hoặc một ai đó mà chúng ta phải có nếu chúng ta muốn làm hoặc trở thành một cái gì đó

examples: The writer drew inspiration from her life experiences, using them as grist for the mill of her creative process.
The writer's poetry is known for its abstract language and thought-provoking imagery.
On the whole, Soviet writers knew when they were putting their heads on the block.
I wear a lot of different hats - from writer to producer and artist.
We asked five successful writers to reveal some of the tricks of the trade.
words.defineEn: someone whose job involves writing articles, books, stories, etc.
words.defineVi: một người có công việc liên quan đến viết bài, sách, truyện, v.v.

words.defineEn: someone whose job involves driving a taxi and taking people to different places
words.defineVi: một người có công việc liên quan đến việc lái xe taxi và đưa mọi người đến những nơi khác nhau

examples: The company kicked off the CEO for embezzlement.
The company abandoned its outdated marketing strategy in favor of a more innovative approach.
Our company puts the emphasis on quality.
Many companies saw the advent of online retailing as a threat to their bricks and mortar business.
The company are playing 11 cities around the country.
words.defineEn: an organization that does business and earns money from it
words.defineVi: một tổ chức kinh doanh và kiếm tiền từ nó

examples: The vision seems a flight of fancy.
He found a cheap flight deal for his vacation.
I need to book a flight to New York for next week's business meeting.
Jimmy often has good ideas but his latest proposal is just a flight of fancy!
We had a great trip, but our flight home was badly delayed, which took the gilt off the gingerbread.
words.defineEn: the act of traveling in an airplane
words.defineVi: hành động đi du lịch trên máy bay

examples: Every day about noon, traffic in town grinds to a halt.
to control the traffic congestion
You can hear the traffic from your room day and night.
Priority is given to traffic already on the roundabout.
The new traffic system worked up to a point, but it had its problems.
words.defineEn: the coming and going of cars, airplanes, etc. in an area at a particular time
words.defineVi: sự đến và đi của ô tô, máy bay, v.v. trong một khu vực vào một thời điểm cụ thể

examples: Once his out, you should close the gate on the spot.
They opened the gate to allow access to the garden.
They came as far as the gate.
We passed through the gates into a courtyard behind.
He closed the gate to prevent the dog from running away.
words.defineEn: the part of a fence or wall outside a building that we can open and close to enter or leave a place
words.defineVi: phần của hàng rào hoặc bức tường bên ngoài tòa nhà mà chúng ta có thể mở và đóng để vào hoặc rời khỏi một nơi

examples: We have a university lecture on art history this afternoon.
The university is working to raise the number of students from state schools.
She attends a prestigious university known for its engineering program.
I will graduate from university next year with a degree in psychology.
This candidate is fresh from university and has no teaching experience.
words.defineEn: an educational institution at the highest level, where we can study for a degree or do research
words.defineVi: một tổ chức giáo dục ở cấp cao nhất, nơi chúng ta có thể học để lấy bằng hoặc nghiên cứu

examples: Schools have welcomed such arrangements with open arms.
The school took the full force of the explosion.
She left school at 16.
Many schools don’t take full advantage of the Internet.
The kids always work hard at school.
words.defineEn: a place where children learn things from teachers
words.defineVi: một nơi mà trẻ em học những điều từ giáo viên
